初遇.encontent:
Someone is just a knight, nameless, wandering, beholden
 to thee for taking me in.If thou dost not mind, please
 let Someone serve thee till the end.
初遇.content:
某人只是一介不知名的流浪骑士。蒙您收留，如不嫌弃，请
让某人为您效劳至最后一刻。

箱中气候.encontent:
If it doesn't stop raining,Someone will be the first
 knight to sacrifice his life because of the rusty
 armor.
箱中气候.content:
如果雨再不停的话，某人可就要成为第一个因盔甲生锈而
牺牲的骑士了。

致未来.encontent:
Chivalry today is not common among young people.In
 the future, will it be even worse? It really makes
 Someone worry.
致未来.content:
如今拥有骑士精神的年轻人已经不多了……未来，会变得
更少吗？真令某人担忧。

孑立.encontent:
Sometimes Someone looks away just like thee, but no
 one hath noticed it.
孑立.content: 某人偶尔也会像您一样目光游离，但从未有人发觉。

朝晨.encontent:
Good morning.Someone is practicing how to rotate the
 plate on the tip of the sword and keep balance.
朝晨.content:
贵安。某人正在训练如何让餐盘在剑尖上旋转并保持平衡
。

信任-朝晨.encontent:
In the age when Someone lived, breakfast is not customary.However,
 thy meal looks so delicious that Someone would like to have
 some grease for himself.
信任-朝晨.content:
在某人生活的年代，尚未有吃早餐的习俗。不过，您的餐
点看起来如此美味，令某人也想给自己抹点润滑油脂了。

夜暮.encontent:
Are you worried about going bald if you stay up late?Someone
 hath an ancient secret recipe from my Lord ... Oh, please do
 not look at the portrait of his grandson.Someone believes there
 is no necessary connection between the two.
夜暮.content:
您担心熬夜会秃头吗？某人这里有来自主君的古老秘方……噢
，请不要翻看他孙子的画像。某人相信两者之间没有必然
联系。

信任-夜暮.encontent:
Many years ago, on a starry night, an old friend drove to the
 moon ... This may surprise thee, but even an elderly armor remembers
 things past once in a while.
信任-夜暮.content:
多年前的一个星夜，某人的旧友曾驱车奔赴月亮……请您
别见怪，上了年纪的盔甲，偶尔也会追忆往事。

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
One step further, and you will be in close contact
 with Someone's nose ...  As long as you can hit Someone's
 head.
帽檐与发鬓.content:
倘若您再往前一步，可就要和某人的鼻子亲密接触了……如
果您能撞得到某人的头的话。

袖与手.encontent:
What is the motivation for A Knight along the way?
 For justice. For honor. For faith ... And for a bit
 of grease to prevent the armor from rusting.
袖与手.content:
支撑某人一路走下去的动力是什么？正义、荣誉、信仰……还
有一丁点防止铠甲生锈的油脂。

衣着与身形.encontent:
Living without the body makes thee disappointed?Then,
 please allow Someone to introduce thee to a trusty
 friend—Knight Dullahan.
衣着与身形.content:
没有身躯令您感到失落吗？那么，请允许某人向您引荐一
位值得信任的朋友，杜拉罕骑士。

嗜好.encontent:
Don't worry. All thy efforts will pay off. Someone
 once learned the difficult technique of armor maintenance,
 and now it can be applied to himself.
嗜好.content:
放心吧，所有的努力都能得到回报。某人曾认真学习过的
盔甲保养手法，如今正好能应用在自己身上。

赞赏.encontent:
Someone hath never doubted the reason for his loyalty
 to thee, and thou hast proved Someone's choice.
赞赏.content:
某人从未怀疑过向您效忠的理由，您也证明了某人的选择
。

亲昵.encontent:
Someone hath experienced the fight on the battlefield, as well
 as the brocade bed and the rose garden.If you'd like some stories,
 Someone is always at thy service.
亲昵.content:
某人体验过战场的厮杀，也感受过织锦睡床与玫瑰花园。如
果您想要一些故事，某人随时为您恭候。

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
Even if the enemy is just an apple, A Knight will follow
 the code of fairness ...  So Someone only challenges
 one at a time.
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
哪怕只是对付一个苹果，某人也会奉行公平的准则……所
以某人一次只挑战一个。

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
Roland sætte luren på blodiga mundi, blæs han i med
 vreide;Då rivna jord og jardir og ljod iver hav iver
 heier.
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
罗兰将号角放进流血的嘴里，用全力吹响它那响声地动山
摇，三天三夜仍萦绕不去

独白.encontent:
Someone's past will fade away with poems in the wind.And
 now, Someone, with the sword,will once again build
 a brand new legend for thee as a knight.
独白.content:
某人的过去将与诗歌一同消失在风中。而今，某人会与这
柄剑一起，再次以骑士的身份，为您铸下新的传奇。

入队.encontent: Someone's sword hath not rusted yet.

战前.encontent: Take thy sword. Duel with Someone fair and square.
战前.content: 举起您的剑，与某人堂堂正正地对决。

召唤至终的仪式.encontent: His trumpets sound. The Judgement Day hath come.
召唤至终的仪式.content: 那号角声在奏响，审判之日已来到。

战斗胜利.encontent:
Considering Someone's physical condition,the investiture
 can be simplified.
战斗胜利.content: 鉴于某人现在的身体状况，授勋仪式可以从简。

洞悉.encontent:
Thank you for taking good care of me. Someone's armor
 was saved from rust.
洞悉.content: 感谢您的照顾，某人的铠甲得以免于锈蚀之苦。

洞悉之底.encontent:
The last time when honored, Someone was only a man
 too young.But Someone's piety and oath hath been unchanged,
 now and always will be.
洞悉之底.content:
上一次受封时，某人还是个年轻到过分的小伙子。但某人
的虔诚与誓言从未改变，从往至今。
